#### Analyzing Data from Week 4 Cognitive Interference Stroop Trial(s)

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggthemes)
library(readxl)
library(reshape2)
library(knitr)
library(ggrepel)

```


```{r}

trial_one <- read_xlsx("data/first_raw_data.xlsx")

```


```{r}

glimpse(trial_one)

#(trial_one)

```





### Reaction Time vs Congruency (image stimuli)

```{r fig.align="center", echo = FALSE,fig.width = 10}



trial_one%>%
      mutate(
    rt = as.numeric(rt)
  )%>%
  filter(rt != "null")%>%
  filter(image != "NA")%>%
  filter(trial_type != "htmlbuttonresponse")%>%
  filter(correct != "NA") %>%
  ggplot(aes(congruency, rt, color=image))+
  geom_point()+
  scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 20)+
  
  labs(
            title="Picture-Word Interference Trial One",
            x="Congruency",
            y="Reaction Time (milliseconds)")+
  theme(plot.margin = margin(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5, "cm"))+
  theme_solarized()




```



###  Reaction Time Histogram

```{r fig.align="center", echo = FALSE,fig.width = 10}






trial_one%>%
        mutate(
    rt = as.numeric(rt)
  )%>%
  
  filter(rt != "null")%>%
  filter(image != "NA")%>%
  filter(rt != "null") %>%
  filter(trial_type != "htmlbuttonresponse")%>%
  filter(correct != "NA") %>% 
  filter(word != "NA")%>%
  ggplot(aes(rt))+
  geom_histogram(bin = 10  ) +#(stat="identity", position = "dodge")+
  
  labs(
            title="Picture-Word Interference Trial One",
            x="Congruency",
            y= "Reaction Time (milliseconds)")+
  scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 20)+

  
  theme(plot.margin = margin(0.5,0.5,0.5,0.5, "cm"))+
  theme_classic()




```
